name: It is for science
description:
In this game, you take on the role of a scientist who works in an illegal chemical laboratory, conducting experiments on animals. One day, while working alone, the lights suddenly go out, and the animals - including rats, monkeys, and more - escape their cages. Now, you must escape the facility before the test subjects exact their revenge. You can use your knowledge of chemicals to your advantage, using poison to fend off the animals and make your escape. Can you make it out alive, or will you become just another failed experiment?

controls: 

move: A W S D

attack: space -> "Use the mouse to aim."
